Key Match Events: The Detroit Tigers came back from a 3-0 deficit to win the game 4-3
Jason Foley secured his 27th save of the season with a strikeout in the ninth inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers have won 30 of their last 39 games
The Tigers' magic number is now two
Others: The Tigers will host the Chicago White Sox in their final series of the regular season
